verses.verse: Woe <S%H1945><s%> to them that go down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8802><s%> to Egypt <S%H4714><s%> for help <S%H5833><s%>; and stay <S%H8172><s%> <S%H8735><s%> on horses <S%H5483><s%>, and trust <S%H982><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in chariots <S%H7393><s%>, because they are many <S%H7227><s%>; and in horsemen <S%H6571><s%>, because they are very <S%H3966><s%> strong <S%H6105><s%> <S%H8804><s%>; but they look <S%H8159><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not unto HaKadosh <S%H6918><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, neither seek <S%H1875><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> !

Yet he also is wise <S%H2450><s%>, and will bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%>, and will not call back <S%H5493><s%> <S%H8689><s%> his words <S%H1697><s%>: but will arise <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8804><s%> against the house <S%H1004><s%> of the evildoers <S%H7489><s%> <S%H8688><s%>, and against the help <S%H5833><s%> of them that work <S%H6466><s%> <S%H8802><s%> iniquity <S%H205><s%>.

Now the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> are men <S%H120><s%>, and not 'Elohim <S%H410><s%>; and their horses <S%H5483><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%>, and not spirit <S%H7307><s%>. When the YY <S%H3068><s%> shall stretch out <S%H5186><s%> <S%H8686><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%>, both he that helpeth <S%H5826><s%> <S%H8802><s%> shall fall <S%H3782><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and he that is holpen <S%H5826><s%> <S%H8803><s%> shall fall down <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and they all shall fail <S%H3615><s%> <S%H8799><s%> together <S%H3162><s%>.

For thus hath the YY <S%H3068><s%> spoken <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto me, Like as the lion <S%H738><s%> and the young lion <S%H3715><s%> roaring <S%H1897><s%> <S%H8799><s%> on his prey <S%H2964><s%>, when a multitude <S%H4393><s%> of shepherds <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8802><s%> is called forth <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8735><s%> against him, he will not be afraid <S%H2865><s%> <S%H8735><s%> of their voice <S%H6963><s%>, nor abase <S%H6031><s%> <S%H8799><s%> himself for the noise <S%H1995><s%> of them: so shall the YY <S%H3068><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%> come down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to fight <S%H6633><s%> <S%H8800><s%> for mount <S%H2022><s%> TZiyon <S%H6726><s%>, and for the hill <S%H1389><s%> thereof.

As birds <S%H6833><s%> flying <S%H5774><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, so will the YY <S%H3068><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%> defend <S%H1598><s%> <S%H8686><s%> Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>; defending <S%H1598><s%> <S%H8800><s%> also he will deliver <S%H5337><s%> <S%H8689><s%> it; and passing over <S%H6452><s%> <S%H8800><s%> he will preserve <S%H4422><s%> <S%H8689><s%> it.
Turn <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8798><s%> ye unto him from whom the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> have deeply <S%H6009><s%> <S%H8689><s%> revolted <S%H5627><s%>.

For in that day <S%H3117><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> shall cast away <S%H3988><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his idols <S%H457><s%> of silver <S%H3701><s%>, and his idols <S%H457><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%>, which your own hands <S%H3027><s%> have made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto you for a sin <S%H2399><s%>.

Then shall the Ashurn <S%H804><s%> fall <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8804><s%> with the sword <S%H2719><s%>, not of a mighty man <S%H376><s%>; and the sword <S%H2719><s%>, not of a mean man <S%H120><s%>, shall devour <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him: but he shall flee <S%H5127><s%> <S%H8804><s%> from <S%H6440><s%> the sword <S%H2719><s%>, and his young men <S%H970><s%> shall be discomfited <S%H4522><s%>.

And he shall pass over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to his strong hold <S%H5553><s%> for fear <S%H4032><s%>, and his princes <S%H8269><s%> shall be afraid <S%H2865><s%> <S%H8804><s%> of the ensign <S%H5251><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, whose fire <S%H217><s%> is in TZiyon <S%H6726><s%>, and his furnace <S%H8574><s%> in Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>.
